column4: where can i get more screen savers? i want a new screen saver for umdm :((((((((((((((((
look at the xscreensaver package, although ubuntu has quite a few...
none of them are cool enough :/
theres one screen saver i want but its not installed how do i install it. im using xscreensaver
do you have "Applications  Places  System" in the upper left hand corner of your screen?
then you're running gnome. click System -> Preferences -> Screensaver. all should be listed there
theres one not installed but how do i install it
not sure actually. sorry. i have never bothered installing separate screensavers other than what is provided
